author: Justine Coleman
title: Website documents anti-Asian discrimination amid coronavirus crisis
description: A website set up last week by Asian American groups to document accounts of anti-Asian discrimination has recorded about 150 incidents, as advocates warn of a spike in verbal and physical violence amid the coronavirus pan...
content:
A website set up last week by Asian American groups to document accounts of anti-Asian discrimination has recorded about 150 incidents, as advocates warn of a spike in verbal and physical violence amid the coronavirus pandemic.
